Title: Bob Fires the Kids
Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Lizzie Molyneux, Wendy Molyneux, Jim Dauterive (creator), Lizzie Molyneux (story editor), Kelvin Yu (story editor), Scott Jacobson (executive story editor), Holly Schlesinger (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (story editor), Nora Smith (story editor), Steven Davis (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, John Roberts
Plot: Fearing that he is ruining their childhoods, Bob fires the kids from their jobs at the restaurant, but they just end up working for hippies who run a marijuana farm, instead.
